body:
Hey Avicus players!

I've made 2 maps so far, and am working on a third one right now.
But, even though it almost never happens to me, I'm out of ideas to build!

The maps I've made are YinYang and Smite, which are both not accepted yet :P

I'd love to hear your ideas and I'll try my best to make them look how you expected them to look.
Even though I'm not sure what to build, I got a few things the ideas need to have:
- Needs to be kinda original, not something that has already been done on avicus.
- Good for gameplay AND looks. I really hate maps that are made within an hour  and look horrible. But yeah, that's just my opinion I guess :P

Thanks a lot for helping me!
-Clijmart
Comment your ideas down below!

title: Map Making Ideas

replies.body: I think that you can make a map which includes CTW and DTM both. I mean you'll need to capture a wool, then you will need to destroy a monument. I don't know what people will think on that but I believe that this might be interesting.
replies.body_tagged: I think that you can make a map which includes CTW and DTM both. I mean you'll need to capture a wool, then you will need to destroy a monument. I don't know what people will think on that but I believe that this might be interesting.

replies.body:
Sounds interesting, but I'm not sure if I'm able to do that, since the plugins have to be changed I guess... Could ask some info to the devs about it :)
Thanks for your suggestion!
replies.body_tagged:
Sounds interesting, but I'm not sure if I'm able to do that, since the plugins have to be changed I guess... Could ask some info to the devs about it :)
Thanks for your suggestion!

replies.body:
This is going to be hard, a lot of people are going to be asking you for different ideas and suggestions. Good luck getting both of your maps accepted btw :)

If you could, make a map that has 3 monuments, vertical to where you spawn, and 1 behind it. Some challenge would be nice :P
